code:
-spec sum_counts(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
sum_counts(Nums) ->
    Mod = 1000000007,
    N = length(Nums),
    Maps = lists:foldl(fun(X, Acc) -> update_maps(X, Acc, Mod) end, {maps:new(), 0}, Nums),
    {_LastMap, Result} = Maps,
    Sum = lists:foldl(fun(_, Acc) -> (Acc + Result) rem Mod end, 0, lists:seq(1, N)),
    Sum.

update_maps(Num, {Map, Sum}, Mod) ->
    case maps:find(Num, Map) of
        {ok, OldCount} ->
            NewSum = (Sum + OldCount + 1) rem Mod,
            {maps:update(Num, OldCount + 1, Map), NewSum};
        error ->
            {maps:put(Num, 1, Map), Sum}
    end.
